entry.title: Warner Music Group to Release Polygon Music NFTs Through LGND Platform
entry.summary: The major record label continues its streak of Web3 partnerships by teaming with a new music and collectibles platform built on Polygon.

entry.title: ConsenSys Updates Privacy Policy for MetaMask, Infura After Community Pushback
entry.summary: Following hefty pushback from the crypto community last month, ConsenSys has updated and clarified how it uses MetaMask and Infura data.

entry.title: Former CFTC Commissioner Takes Up Head of Policy Role at Andreessen Horowitz
entry.summary: Former CFTC Commissioner Brian Quintenz has accepted the full-time position as the head of policy at crypto VC giant a16z.

entry.title: Silvergate CEO Tackles 'Misinformation', Short Sellers Amid Stock Downgrade
entry.summary: With Morgan Stanley’s downgrade hamstringing Silvergate shares, the firm's CEO issued a note to "set the record straight" about the company.

entry.title: Nexus Mutual Hit With $3M in Ethereum Exposure to Orthogonal Trading Default
entry.summary: Crypto insurance protocol Nexus Mutual is the latest firm to get hit with the knock-on effects of FTX's collapse last month.

entry.title: FTC Probes ‘Possible Misconduct’ in Cryptocurrency Advertising
entry.summary: The U.S. consumer watchdog is reportedly probing several crypto firms over allegations their ads were deceptive or misleading.

entry.title: Why Isn’t Sam Bankman-Fried Behind Bars?
entry.summary: Spoiler alert: it hasn’t yet been determined whether he did anything criminal.

entry.title: GameStop Cuts More Staff—Including Crypto Wallet Engineers
entry.summary: Former employees say they were laid off from the gaming retail giant today, including engineers focused on its crypto efforts.

entry.title: U.S. Rep. Maxine Waters Insists SBF Attend FTX Hearing on Capitol Hill
entry.summary: The ranking member of the House Financial Services Committee tells the embattled ex-CEO that skipping out not an option.

entry.title: Nexo to Phase Out Service in US After Hitting 'Dead End' With Regulators
entry.summary: The U.K. crypto lender said it would suspend access to its Earn product in eight states from tomorrow.

entry.title: DeFi Lender Maple Finance Cuts Off Orthogonal Trading for 'Misrepresenting Its Financial Position'
entry.summary: After allegedly misrepresenting its finances to a lender on Maple Finance, the credit platform has cut all ties with Orthogonal Trading.

entry.title: Aave Companies Acquires Social Metaverse Developer Sonar
entry.summary: The acquisition will see Sonar integrate Aave’s Lens protocol to introduce decentralized account profiles for its social mobile metaverse app.

entry.title: Circle, SPAC Call Off Plan to Take USDC Issuer Public
entry.summary: The mutual termination comes after over a year and a half of deliberating around the terms of Circle’s potential multibillion-dollar listing.

entry.title: Former IRS Agents at Binance Seek to Keep Crypto Crime-Free
entry.summary: The world’s biggest exchange has recruited top talent from law enforcement to take on cryptocurrency criminals.

entry.title: Bitcoin Could Drop to $5,000 in 2023 ‘Surprise’: Standard Chartered
entry.summary: Biden gets impeached, food prices collapse, and Bitcoin hits $5,000 all made Standard Chartered’s list of surprises for next year.

entry.title: Bybit, Swyftx Join List of Crypto Firms Reducing Workforce
entry.summary: Two more crypto exchanges, Bybit and Swyftx, join the long list of companies to announce headcount reductions as crypto winter bites harder.

entry.title: Axie Infinity Leads Metaverse, NFT Token Rally as Trade Volumes Surge
entry.summary: Amid a wider crypto market recovery, metaverse and NFT-related tokens in Apecoin, AXS, Sandbox, and others are benefitting the most.

entry.title: Many DAOs and Web3 Projects Are ‘Decentralization Theater’: Tezos Co-Founder
entry.summary: Kathleen Breitman says a focus on decentralization is critical to achieving longevity in Web3.

entry.title: SBF Publicly Punts on U.S. House Hearing Invitation
entry.summary: Lawmakers wanted the disgraced cryptocurrency exchange founder to testify about the collapse of FTX.

entry.title: TIMEX Launches $2,500 Bored Ape Watches and Matching NFTs
entry.summary: The luxury watchmaker unveiled a line of 500 one-of-one customizable timepieces.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Sam Bankman-Fried Won't Stop Talking, Coinbase Challenges Apple
entry.summary: Also, the Caribbean island of Dominica is issuing the “world’s first national coin,” entitling holders to Dominican passports.

entry.title: Coinbase CEO Rejects FTX ‘Accounting Error,’ Says Funds Were Obviously ‘Stolen’
entry.summary: Brian Armstrong says only the “most gullible person” would believe an $8 billion hole was due to lackluster accounting.

entry.title: Genesis Owes Gemini Earn Users $900M: Report
entry.summary: Gemini has yet to reopen withdrawals for users of its Earn service due to crypto market contagion from FTX.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Twitter Speculation Sends Dogecoin Higher, Bitcoin and Ethereum See Green
entry.summary: ETH rose nicely even as the FTX drama continues. Brazilian lawmakers also took a significant step towards regulating cryptocurrencies.

entry.title: Let’s Dispel Some Misconceptions About Wrapped Bitcoin and Ethereum
entry.summary: This week saw misinformation on Twitter about potential "insolvency" of WETH. None of that was accurate. Here's how wrapped coins work.

entry.title: How to Move Bitcoin, Ethereum and Other Crypto to Self-Custody
entry.summary: Worried about your Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other crypto being trapped on a centralized exchange like FTX? Here's how to change that.

entry.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business—plus misconceptions in the crypto space.

entry.title: Three Arrows Liquidators Seize $35M, Seek $30M More for 'Much Wow' Superyacht
entry.summary: But the bust firm’s co-founders still aren’t cooperating, a Friday document shows.

entry.title: Coinbase Pauses Plans for Bored Ape Yacht Club NFT Short Film Trilogy
entry.summary: The “Degen Trilogy” series is on hold, the company confirmed to Decrypt, months after the widely panned first entry was released.

entry.title: MetaMask Co-Founder Wants to 'Dump' Apple, Calls iOS Purchase Tax 'Abuse'
entry.summary: MetaMask’s co-founder and co-lead developer Dan Finlay says he’s prepared to take a stand against Apple in solidarity with Coinbase Wallet.

entry.title: Maxine Waters Thanks SBF for Being 'Candid' About FTX Collapse
entry.summary: The lawmaker has invited Bankman-Fried to testify before the House Financial Services Committee this month.

entry.title: Yahoo to Offer Retail Stock Trading—Is Crypto Next?
entry.summary: Sources have told Decrypt that Apollo wants to offer retail crypto trading on Yahoo Finance.

entry.title: Crypto Holiday Gift Guide 2022
entry.summary: 'Tis the season to be jolly—spread some festive cheer with our guide to the best holiday crypto gifts for all budgets.

entry.title: Galaxy Digital Wins Celsius Bankruptcy Auction to Acquire Crypto Custodian GK8
entry.summary: GK8, one of the assets put up for auction during Celsius’ bankruptcy proceedings, will play a role in Galaxy Digital’s institutional offering.

entry.title: Australian Stock Exchange Fires 200 Contractors Working on Canceled Blockchain Project
entry.summary: Shortly after axing its blockchain project, the Australian Securities Exchange has now laid off 200 contractors working on the project.

entry.title: Korean Prosecutors Seek Arrest of Terra Co-Founder Over $105M LUNA Sale
entry.summary: Daniel Shin attended a court hearing over whether he should be arrested for allegedly extracting illegal profits prior to Terra's collapse.

entry.title: Binance Pauses Withdrawals Amid $5M Ankr 'Infinite Mint' Hack
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao announced that the exchange had paused withdrawals following an exploit on the crypto node project Ankr.

entry.title: DOJ Watchdog Seeks Independent Examiner of FTX Collapse
entry.summary: The internal agency compares the failure of FTX to that of Lehman Brothers and New Century Financial.

entry.title: Three Arrows Founders Have One Week to Provide Key Financial Documents: Singapore Court
entry.summary: The documents would help liquidators locate funds and settle claims with the creditors of the bankrupt hedge fund.

entry.title: Solana Soars, Flow Falls as NFT Market Declines Further in November
entry.summary: Trading in November is about 88% lower than January as overall volume and total NFTs sold both slump even further.

entry.title: Politicians Are Giving Back Their Donations From Disgraced FTX Founder
entry.summary: Among the politicians who haven't commented on their SBF donations: Sens. Boozman and Stabenow, who co-sponsored the DCCPA bill.

entry.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch
entry.summary: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.

entry.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he’s looking forward to in Web3.

entry.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.

entry.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.

entry.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
entry.summary: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.

entry.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next
entry.summary: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
entry.summary: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?
entry.summary: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.
